title: The Latest: Former coach says Odom is in improved condition
text: The Latest: Former coach says Odom is in improved condition - WQOW TV: Eau Claire, WI NEWS18 News, Weather, and Sports Member Center: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom's aunt are speaking out to thank fans as he remains hospitalized after being found unconscious Tuesday at the Love Ranch brothel in Nevada. More >> Lamar Odom has regained consciousness, and is communicating - speaking and even giving a thumbs up from his hospital bed - just days after being found in extremely critical condition at a Nevada brothel, loved ones said. More >> The Latest: Former coach says Odom is in improved condition The latest on the hospitalization of Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious Tuesday in a Nevada brothel (all times local): More >> The latest on the hospitalization of Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious Tuesday in a Nevada brothel (all times local): More >> Nevada memo: DraftKings described self as gambling Daily   Nevada says   sites like   gambling and are using the company's own words as evidence. More >> Oklahoma agrees to hold off executions until at least 2016 Oklahoma's attorney general has agreed to not request execution dates until 2016, as his office investigates why the state used the wrong drug to execute an inmate in January, according to court documents filed... More >> By JILL BLEED Associated Press No executions will be scheduled in Oklahoma until at least next year as the attorney general's office investigates why the state used the wrong drug during a lethal... More >> Police: Mom, daughter charged in love triangle slaying Police say a woman and her husband became romantically involved with another woman, but tensions grew once the other woman moved in and the wife plotted with teenagers to kill the other two. More >> A woman who shared a female lover with her husband decided to kill them both after she fell out of the love triangle, and she recruited her teenage daughter and the daughter's boyfriend to help her do it, police and a... More >> Army   Police:   Family of boy shot by Ohio officer seeks special prosecutor Lawyers for the family of a 12-year-old black boy who was carrying a pellet gun when he was fatally shot by a white police officer have made an emphatic call for a special prosecutor to take over an investigation... More >> Lawyers for the family of a 12-year-old black boy who was carrying a pellet gun when he was fatally shot by a white police officer have made an emphatic call for a special prosecutor to take over an investigation they say... More >> Interior Department curbs future Arctic offshore drilling The Interior Department says it will not extend Arctic offshore leases held by Royal Dutch Shell and other companies in Arctic waters off Alaska's northern coast. More >> The Interior Department announced Friday it is canceling future lease sales and will not extend current leases in Arctic waters off Alaska's northern coast, a decision that significantly reduces the chances for future... More >> Ex-CNN couple sue Motel 6 after shooting in Albuquerque A pair of former CNN journalists are suing Motel 6 after a man tried to rob the couple at gunpoint and the encounter led to an exchange of gunfire that wounded one of the former reporters. More >> Two former CNN journalists are suing Motel 6, saying one of the budget chain's Albuquerque inns didn't do enough to ensure their safety the night a man tried to rob them and an exchange of gunfire ensued. More >>
